unnormalised: Hey there, environment enthusiasts! Ever wondered what happens to all that Diwali sweet wrapping and plastic waste after the festivities? Well, things are happening in waste management, and some of it is actually pretty cool!

unnormalised: The IIT-Delhi is making some serious headway in converting agricultural waste into biofuel – talk about *jugaad*! Imagine, turning the leftover paddy straw from Punjab into something that powers our cars!

unnormalised: But not everything is rosy. Municipalities in cities like Mumbai are still struggling with overflowing landfills and improper segregation. Remember the movie *'Gully Boy'* and the stark visuals of the city? We need more efficient systems.

unnormalised: On a brighter note, many Chennai communities are adopting door-to-door waste collection systems and composting initiatives.
